abstract: European leaders now accept that the Continent has a responsibility not just to prevent collapse but to get the Greek economy moving again.
snippet: European leaders now accept that the Continent has a responsibility not just to prevent collapse but to get the Greek economy moving again.
lead_paragraph: If there was one lesson to be learned from the European sovereign debt crisis, it was that monetary union by itself cannot work indefinitely. If Europe really wants to preserve the advantages of the euro currency, it will need far more fiscal and economic integration. Nations will have to give up a significant amount of sovereignty.

headline.main: To Preserve Its Currency Union, Europe Needs a Financial Union
headline.print_headline: Europe’s Choice: A Currency Union Or a Financial Union
